lexUnit.name: conscious.a

document.description: Slate magazine article: Entrepreneur as Madonna
document.name: EntrepreneurAsMadonna

lexUnit.definition: FN: having awareness or knowledge of something

sentence.text: McLeish decided not to expand , and rose to go , conscious that it was one-thirty a.m .

I was conscious that here I belonged to a community with roots in the distant past and a distinguished place in British history .
